price: 1. Nabiyow Munaafiqhiin koi tamaate waqdi, sinni arrabat diggah, atu yallih farmoyta kinnitoomuh sumaaqitnah itte, diggah Yalli atu kay farmoyta kinnitom yaaxigeh kaadu Yalli sumaaqitah diggah, munaafiqhiin dirableela kinniimil.
arabic: إِذَا جَآءَكَ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ قَالُواْ نَشۡهَدُ إِنَّكَ لَرَسُولُ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ إِنَّكَ لَرَسُولُهُۥ وَٱللَّهُ يَشۡهَدُ إِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ لَكَٰذِبُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: idhā jāaka al-munāfiqūna qālū nashhadu innaka larasūlu al-lahi wal-lahu yaʿlamu innaka larasūluhu wal-lahu yashhadu inna al-munāfiqīna lakādhibūna
